title: Xero
description: Xero's brand colors primarily feature the vibrant '06B3E8' which represents their modern and innovative approach to accounting solutions. The minimalist '000000' and 'FFFFFF' complement the design, ensuring a sleek and professional user experience. '7A7E85' adds a sophisticated touch to the palette. These colors underscore the information found in their official brand guidelines sourced from the Xero App Partner Brand Guidelines.
